arts.ttl: Donald Trump and Michael Jackson's ex-lawyer 'to copy' Ryan Reynolds' Wrexham FC plan
arts.sum: Joe Tacopina, a former lawyer to ex-U.S. President Donald Trump and pop superstar Michael Jackson, is reportedly eyeing a Ryan Reynolds-style takeover at Tranmere Rovers

arts.ttl: Wrexham preserve place at top of League 1 table
arts.sum: Wrexham remain at the top of the League One table after bouncing back from their first defeat of the season to beat Crawley Town 2-1.

arts.ttl: Late winner ensures Wrexham overcome Crawley
arts.sum: Max Cleworth hit the late winner as Wrexham returned to winning ways with a 2-1 home win over Crawley.

arts.ttl: Max Cleworth’s winner gets Wrexham back to winning ways
Wrexham fans make Ryan Reynolds point as stern official statement released
arts.sum: Wrexham have released a statement warning supporters to cut out 'persistent standing' during matches or the club could face 'further action' and 'reduced capacity'
